title: Gold Holds Gains After Fed Delivers Rate Cut and Leans Dovish
description: Gold held gains after the US Federal Reserve delivered a widely expected third straight interest-rate cut on Wednesday. Silver rose to a record.
content: Gold held gains after the US Federal Reserve delivered a widely expected third straight interest-rate cut on Wednesday. Silver rose to a record.
